Title: On Tilt
Plot: When Aceveda confirms that the Strike Team is the target of an Armenian mob hit, Mackey must take matters into his own hands.  Meanwhile, Whym's career is on the line when she disobeys Aceveda's orders to put a case to rest that may prove the innocence of convicted felons.
GuestStars: Andre 3000, David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Michael Tomlinson, Stana Katic, Yasmine Delawari, Michael Benyaer
